description: This file defines authentication routes for user registration and login in a FastAPI application, including route handlers, external dependencies, and response schemas.

classes.name: UserCreate
classes.description: Schema for user registration data, including email, password, and optional display name.

classes.name: UserLogin
classes.description: Schema for user login credentials, including email and password.

classes.name: UserOut
classes.description: Schema for user profile output, used in responses.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Handles user registration, creates a new user, and returns an access token and user profile.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Handles user authentication, returns an access token and user profile upon success.
